# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/student/iot/iot/Challenge02-MorseCode/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_MORSE_CPP_FILES
    "/home/student/iot/iot/Challenge02-MorseCode/source/coder.cpp"
    "/home/student/iot/iot/Challenge02-MorseCode/source/morse.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_MORSE_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/student/iot/iot/Challenge02-MorseCode/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (morse
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_MORSE_CPP_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(morse PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE morse)



target_link_libraries(morse
    microbit
)
